channel.title: Ursula Le Guin on madsky
channel.description: Recent content in Ursula Le Guin on madsky

item.title: A Wizard of Earthsea
item.description: I broadly stay away from the fantasy genre in fiction because in my limited experience it tends to all add up to the same thing: a bleak, endless tapestry of anguish and torment sans reprieve - like Game of Thrones.

item.title: The Ones Who Walk Away From Omelas
item.description: Discussed on the podcast Very Bad Wizards a while back, this is an uncomfortable short story with indirect but clear parallels to the world today.
